Title: We're All Beasts
Writer: George Pelecanos (created by), David Simon (created by), Megan Abbott, Stephani DeLuca
Actors: James Franco, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Gbenga Akinnagbe, Chris Bauer
Plot: Candy (Maggie Gyllenhaal) shoots her opus guerilla-style on the streets of New York. Vincent (James Franco) makes a confession to Abby (Margarita Levieva), along with a promise to change. ...
